name: Aria Valen
summary: A military-raised operative whose involvement with [REDACTED] archival material preceded her disappearance.
backstory: Raised in a controlled military program, Aria Valen was conditioned for intelligence work from an early age. Her exposure to classified archival systems resulted in multiple memory gaps and a gradual behavioral shift.
details: Assigned to deep-record analysis and containment review. Clearance escalated twice within a single year before records ceased.
recentActions: Filed anomalous report regarding memory recursion
Last confirmed presence in Archive Wing C
logs: Log 01 — Initial induction into intelligence program approved.
Log 05 — Subject displays abnormal recall retention.
Log 09 — Archive access request flagged for review.
Log 12 — Subject status updated to MISSING.

name: Kael Thorne
summary: Former naval officer operating beyond formal command, known for selective compliance and operational autonomy.
backstory: Kael Thorne served as a decorated officer before severing ties with central command. His transition to independent work followed a classified disciplinary hearing.
details: Frequently contracted for convoy security and asset extraction. Maintains informal contacts within naval logistics.
logs: Log 14 — Surveillance reduced per oversight decision.

details: All mission data restricted. Access requires clearance override. Exposure risk classified as severe.

name: Ezra Kline
summary: Senior systems engineer responsible for maintaining archival integrity and memory indexing infrastructure.
